meanings.definition: Loose particles of rock or mineral that cover beaches and deserts.
meanings.sent1: The sands on the beach felt warm under my feet.
meanings.sent2: The children played happily in the sands by the shore.
meanings.sent3: The windswept sands seemed to whisper secrets to the ocean.
meanings.sent4: Time slipped through his fingers like sands in an hourglass.
meanings.sent5: The sands sparkled like a million tiny diamonds in the sunlight.

meanings.definition: A beach or desert area covered with sand.
meanings.sent1: The vast sands of the desert stretched endlessly before us.
meanings.sent2: She built a magnificent sandcastle on the beach sands.
meanings.sent3: The picnic on the sands turned into a sandy food fight.
meanings.sent4: The sands of time seemed to stand still in that moment.
meanings.sent5: The golden sands glowed in the moonlight like a magical carpet.

meanings.definition: To sprinkle or cover with sand.
meanings.sent1: She carefully sands the wooden table to make it smooth.
meanings.sent2: The workers will sand the walls before painting them.
meanings.sent3: He accidentally sanded his shoes while working on the deck.
meanings.sent4: The artist gently sands the sculpture to add texture.
meanings.sent5: The carpenter sands the edges of the door for a perfect fit.
